---------------------------------------------------------------------------
In this thriller focused on a race against time, opposing philosophies of two men involved in a complicated love triangle with a beautiful woman (Liv Tyler) turn into a serious battle of wills discusses the strengths of these two men. In the plot, the fundamentalist Christian (Patrick Wilson) forces the atheist (Charlie Hunnam) to be hung at the top of a tall building. The fundamentalist atheist gives an hour to choose between his own life and the life of another person, while a policeman (Terrence Howard) tries to convince him to come down from the top of that building. Without believing in life after death, he would be able to make such a sacrifice? "The Temptation" (The Ledge) is a study of love and conviction of the personalities involved that forces us to ask ourselves how far we were going for something you really believe.
